name: Diablo
description: extracts the game files from the GOG installer and runs the game using the linux version of devilution. Requires innoextract to be installed.
content:
files:
- devilution: https://github.com/diasurgical/devilutionX/releases/download/0.4.0/devilutionx-linux-i386.tar.xz
- installer: N/A:Please select the GOG installer
game:
  arch: i386
  exe: $GAMEDIR/game/devilution
installer:
- execute:
    command: innoextract --gog -d $CACHE/diablo installer
    description: extracting game data
- mkdir:
    command: mkdir $CACHE/devilution
    description: creating temporary directory for devilution
- execute:
    command: tar xf devilution --xz $CACHE/devilution
    description: extracting devilution
- move:
    description: moving devilution files
    dst: $GAMEDIR/game
    src: $CACHE/devilution
- move:
    description: moving the game files
    dst: $GAMEDIR/game
    src: $CACHE/diablo/app
